reasoning: Reporting incidence. T-cell lymphomas comprise ~10-15% of Non-Hodgkin lymphomas. Global NHL incidence ~10 per 100k, T-cell subtypes ~1.5 per 100k based on SEER and international registry data.
source: Vose J et al. (2008). International peripheral T-cell and natural killer/T-cell lymphoma study. J Clin Oncol. 26(25):4124-4130
